== 0.2.2 2008-04-19

* 1 enhancement:
  * Viddler::Video#embed_code method now can receive hash with options

== 0.2.1 2008-04-19

* 1 bug fix:
  * Fixing compatibility of <tt>viddler.videos.upload</tt> method with Rails

== 0.2.0 2008-04-18

* 1 major enhancement:
  * Implemented <tt>videos.getRecordToken</tt> method

== 0.1.0 2008-04-17

* 1 major enhancement:
  * Initial release
